comments: easy VERY HELPFUL take her and do the work and you will also be entertained
She is a fun professor. .but doesn\'t get grades back in a timely manner.The day of the final I still didn\'t know where I stood with my grade.good luck.

Awesome professor, very helpful! If you are willing to learn she will go out of her way to make sure you understand everything. (Not sure what the previous poster ment about not being great for females because I never had a problem with her and I know several women that didn\'t either!)
Good teacher for male\'s... not a good teacher for female\'s. read inbetween the lines....
She\'s a great teacher, I never understood math, until I took her, I deserved an F in the class but passed with a C! She\'s very fun and interesting

Amber is AWESOME! She certainly helps you if you need it! Goes out of her way to help you understand.She is helpful and a great teacher! Would recommend! THANK AMBER for going above and beyond for your students!!!
She really works with you! I think she is great! I would recommend for sure!

Just not sure about her yet! Very confusing at times. Makes a lot of mistakes while teaching in class on the overhead projector you are always erasing things and trying to follow along while fixing the mistakes! Not good!!!
